column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Some of the best tasting ramen in town
column2: I've been to a few places around town and Jinya is hands down the best tasting
column4: and highest quality ramen I can find in downtown Houston. The bar is great and set up with just about everything you want to make a good night better
column5: an their appetizers are to die for. Like seriously their gyoza is a must. If you really want to get your hands some great tasting ramen at an awesome price in an inviting and laid back environment this is your place.
